headline: Constellation Brands beer sales drop: Beverage stock playbook
summary: Constellation Brands (STZ), the maker of Modelo and Corona beers, is raising concerns about the beverage sector. RBC Capital Markets managing director Nik Modi joins Market Domination Overtime to outline how to play alcohol stocks, specifically Constellation Brands, Boston Beer (SAM), and Brown Forman (BF-B, BF-A), as well as soda names, like Coca-Cola (KO) and PepsiCo (PEP). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.

content.title: Constellation Brands beer sales drop: Beverage stock playbook
content.description:
Constellation Brands (STZ), the maker of Modelo and Corona beers, is raising concerns about the beverage sector.

RBC Capital Markets managing director Nik Modi joins Market Domination Overtime to outline how to play alcohol stocks, specifically Constellation Brands, Boston Beer (SAM), and Brown Forman (BF-B, BF-A), as well as soda names, like Coca-Cola (KO) and PepsiCo (PEP).

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.
